name: Cubix: Match-3
summary:
Over 1,000 levels can vary from 2 to 4 colors for the cubes to cycle through, challenging your abilities by increasing their difficulty even further!
And there's more! Cubix also includes 5 different special cubes that introduce new challenges that fully change the approach you must take to solve a level perfectly. Don't forget to complete 60+ achievements with hilarious pop culture references!
Want to build your own levels? Cubix comes with a level editor, where you can test and save new levels!
